eyrie_ascent.name: The Eyrie Ascent
eyrie_ascent.description: The only approach to the Aerie is a series of narrow, hand-carved steps and rope ladders ascending a sheer cliff face. The wind howls around you, threatening to tear you from your holds. Far below, the clouds look like a soft, white sea.

events.details: Requires a Moderate DC 14 Might (Athletics) check to complete the climb without issue. On a failure, a character may lose some Vitality from falling debris or exhaustion.

great_roost.name: The Great Roost
great_roost.description: The ascent opens onto a massive, multi-leveled platform built into the mountainside, serving as the heart of the Aerie. Dwellings are carved directly into the rock, connected by swaying rope bridges. The Skyveil people, with their sharp eyes and falcon-like features, move with a startling grace, their crimson-crested hair vibrant against the grey stone.

hunters_lodge.name: The Sky-Hunter's Lodge
hunters_lodge.description: A large, communal cavern warmed by a central fire pit. The walls are adorned with trophies from legendary hunts: massive horns, strange feathers, and the skulls of mountain beasts. Hunters are gathered here, sharing stories, sharpening their talons, and maintaining their bows. The air smells of woodsmoke and roasted meat.

events.details: A good place to learn about the dangers of the Roost of the Tempest, or hear tales of the Arcane Dominion's incursions into their territory.

elders_perch.name: Elder Vasha's Perch
elders_perch.description: The highest point in the Aerie, a secluded dwelling open to the sky. Wind chimes made of bone and crystal create a constant, haunting melody. Here sits Elder Vasha, the matriarch, her silver-grey feathers marking her age and wisdom. Her gaze is as sharp and discerning as a hawk's.

path_to_tempest.name: Path to the Tempest
path_to_tempest.description: A high, wind-scoured trail that leads away from the relative shelter of the Aerie and further up the mountain peaks. The sky darkens ahead, and the air crackles with a distant, electrical charge. This is the path to the Roost of the Tempest.
